医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
怀孕期间地中海饮食与更健康的妈妈和婴儿有关系统评价和荟萃分析调查了怀孕期间地中海饮食对围产期健康的影响，显示出其在减少妊娠糖尿病和改善出生结局方面的显着益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Eating-Mediterranean-style-during-pregnancy-linked-to-healthier-moms-and-babies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Eating-Mediterranean-style-during-pregnancy-linked-to-healthier-moms-and-babies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c36fb426-ed08-4988-be33-dbed45e34c19 Thu, 11 Apr 2024 20:34:00 -0400 Eating Mediterranean-style during pregnancy linked to healthier moms and babies
探索葫芦科植物的健康秘密：仔细观察葫芦科植物和苦瓜该评论调查了黄瓜和苦瓜植物对健康的影响，强调了它们由于富含生物活性化合物而在控制糖尿病、炎症和癌症方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Exploring-the-health-secrets-of-cucurbits-A-closer-look-at-Cucumis-and-Momordica.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Exploring-the-health-secrets-of-cucurbits-A-closer-look-at-Cucumis-and-Momordica.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=944ab30f-6d9d-410a-b57a-f189fa238dae Thu, 11 Apr 2024 20:24:00 -0400 Exploring the health secrets of cucurbits: A closer look at Cucumis and Momordica
Metrion Biosciences 通过访问 Enamine 化合物库增强了高通量筛选服务https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Metrion-Biosciences-enhances-High-Throughput-Screening-services-with-access-to-Enamine-compound-libraries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Metrion-Biosciences-enhances-High-Throughput-Screening-services-with-access-to-Enamine-compound-libraries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8b87c45-0c52-4c36-9614-2b37887d3630 Thu, 11 Apr 2024 06:31:00 -0400 Metrion Biosciences enhances High Throughput Screening services with access to Enamine compound libraries
事实证明，每年接种一次 COVID-19 疫苗对于个人健康和钱包来说是一项明智的投资研究发现，无论保险状况如何，每年接种一次 COVID-19 疫苗对个人来说在临床和经济上都是有益的，可以通过降低感染的可能性及其相关成本来节省开支。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Annual-COVID-19-vaccine-proves-to-be-a-wise-investment-for-personal-health-and-pocketbook.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Annual-COVID-19-vaccine-proves-to-be-a-wise-investment-for-personal-health-and-pocketbook.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d21d608-65b3-49bb-a44a-b86134e978e7 Thu, 11 Apr 2024 01:50:00 -0400 Annual COVID-19 vaccine proves to be a wise investment for personal health and pocketbook
研究人员呼吁修改真菌优先列表以应对区域疾病负担研究批评世界卫生组织的真菌优先病原体清单没有完全反映真菌疾病的全球负担，主张修订清单，考虑区域差异并提高毛霉目和组织胞浆菌等病原体的优先顺序。更好地适应它们对公共卫生的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Researchers-call-for-a-revamped-fungal-priority-list-to-combat-regional-disease-burdens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Researchers-call-for-a-revamped-fungal-priority-list-to-combat-regional-disease-burdens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8c86353-8a32-4c64-9d06-d873ae6c4fd9 Thu, 11 Apr 2024 01:35:00 -0400 Researchers call for a revamped fungal priority list to combat regional disease burdens
肠道细菌在肥胖对身体脂肪代谢的影响中发挥着关键作用该综述探讨了肥胖引起的肠道微生物群失调及其对白色和棕色脂肪组织代谢的影响之间复杂的相互作用，重点关注对线粒体的直接和间接影响，强调通过以微生物群为中心的策略治疗肥胖的潜在途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Gut-bacteria-play-a-pivotal-role-in-obesitys-impact-on-body-fat-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Gut-bacteria-play-a-pivotal-role-in-obesitys-impact-on-body-fat-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17281ebb-95c0-4322-ac78-de4d7d86fb1e Thu, 11 Apr 2024 01:18:00 -0400 Gut bacteria play a pivotal role in obesity's impact on body fat metabolism
研究显示每日血糖水平波动比我们想象的更大，这对糖尿病诊断提出了挑战研究表明，使用连续血糖监测，非糖尿病成人的空腹血糖存在显着变化，这对当前的糖尿病诊断标准提出了挑战，并强调需要进行多次测量以减少错误分类。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Study-shows-daily-glucose-levels-fluctuate-more-than-we-thought-challenging-diabetes-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Study-shows-daily-glucose-levels-fluctuate-more-than-we-thought-challenging-diabetes-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42ecc823-4e21-41c4-925d-dc1d45f8b923 Thu, 11 Apr 2024 00:53:00 -0400 Study shows daily glucose levels fluctuate more than we thought, challenging diabetes diagnosis
研究发现，怀孕期间使用止痛药与儿童神经发育障碍无关广泛的研究探讨了怀孕期间对乙酰氨基酚的使用，分析了其与儿童智力障碍、多动症和自闭症的潜在关联，最终在考虑兄弟姐妹分析以控制未测量的混杂因素时发现没有任何联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Pain-reliever-use-in-pregnancy-shows-no-link-to-child-neurodevelopmental-disorders-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Pain-reliever-use-in-pregnancy-shows-no-link-to-child-neurodevelopmental-disorders-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a4ba947-8881-4314-8d27-908889a88c8d Thu, 11 Apr 2024 00:34:00 -0400 Pain reliever use in pregnancy shows no link to child neurodevelopmental disorders, study finds
肿瘤微生物组为增强癌症治疗提供了新见解综合综述揭示了肿瘤驻留细菌对转移性癌症的显着影响，展示了微生物组基因组如何影响肿瘤生物学、免疫系统反应和治疗效果。它为利用以细菌为中心的疗法来补充传统癌症治疗奠定了基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Tumor-microbiomes-offer-new-insights-for-enhancing-cancer-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Tumor-microbiomes-offer-new-insights-for-enhancing-cancer-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a50217fc-ecfb-4b34-bf5e-e2b4808a801a Thu, 11 Apr 2024 00:03:00 -0400 Tumor microbiomes offer new insights for enhancing cancer therapies
ChatGPT 可能是帮助减少疫苗犹豫的有效工具今年在西班牙巴塞罗那举行的 ESCMID 全球大会（原 ECCMID）（4 月 27 日至 30 日）上提出的新研究表明，免费使用且可广泛访问的 ChatGPT 可能是帮助减少公众对疫苗犹豫的有效工具，并与性健康诊所合作，通过提高知识和获得护理的机会，提供有关性传播感染（STI）的有用建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/ChatGPT-could-be-an- effective-tool-to-help-reduce-vaccine-hesitancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/ChatGPT-could-be-an- effective-tool-to-help-reduce-vaccine-hesitancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd85d8a1-69aa-493f-992f-af0073ddf97d Wed, 10 Apr 2024 23:59:00 -0400 ChatGPT could be an effective tool to help reduce vaccine hesitancy
